replies.body: Honestly i would say to nerf his Ult resistances, his Ult CD and remove the aoe damage reduction while using E.
What makes zero sense is how he spins his weapon over his head, yet still autos you.  Lol.
You know what else makes zero sense? Magic, dragons, tiny furry men riding lizards, 80 year old women with knives for legs...

Except all of those follow some kind of logical rule.

Magic always works the same way. Dragons work the same way every time. Skaarl doesn't sometimes stop being immortal, nor does Kled get to keep riding Skaarl after he loses her. Camille doesn't get to walk and attack at the same time, and the only exception to that it follows a clear animation that shows she's jumping back on one leg while sweeping with the other.

Nowhere in League, besides with Jax, do you have someone attacking with a weapon that's actively being used for something else. When Fiora uses her W, she can't attack during it. Ashe can't keep attacking during the animation for W, either. Yasuo can't Q *and* auto at the same time.

Everything else maxes sense. Except for Jax attacking with a weapon that he's doing something else with.
Fiora *can* W while she uses Q, though.

That's the thing, he doesn't really scale well anymore.  In Riot's quest to make League into a 10 minute game, they've completely fucked up every champs power curve, especially ADCs.  Jax used to have it ROUGH early game but he was greatly rewarded for making it to mid and late game.

Now Jax is a lane powerhouse.  As soon as you get sheen you're dangerous and once you hit 6 as long as you're not behind you've basically already hit lategame.  When everyone has 4-6 items though, whilst he used to be god now he's extremely lackluster.  His ideal lategame is being really tanky and doing a lot of damage, but no one in league is tanky now.
